title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Flipped Classroom-Based Mathematics Proficiency Development Program

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Through micro-lecture videos, learners can self-directively acquire eight or more core mathematics concepts within four weeks
In offline classes, learners enhance application skills by analyzing and presenting ten or more real-world problem-solving cases
Through formative assessments, learners achieve weekly learning outcomes of over 80% and establish personalized improvement plans for weaknesses

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
